We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience.

Follow Us:
About Us
Indian River Colony Club is a proud, patriotic, and active, 55 + Country Club community designed for a sensational lifestyle! Known as “The Place Patriots Call Home”™, IRCC is for those who desire a very friendly neighborhood atmosphere, making lifelong friends while living in their own individually owned single family homes. Our residents enjoy an extensive
maintenance program
, (inside and outside maintenance), with the conveniences of condo living. IRCC provides a safe, protected environment with 24-hour manned security.
Owned by the Residents:
IRCC is a not-for-profit, Florida chartered corporation with debt free amenities, owned by the residents and administered by a General Manager. A seven person resident Board of Directors determines fees, policies and goals. IRCC is not subject to a developer or an investor group’s profit motives. All amenities, corporate buildings and grounds are debt free and monetary reserves total in the millions. There have been no special assessments in its 35+ year history.
Our Military Background:
Indian River Colony Club, the first community in Viera, was designed and built for retired Military officers and their spouses to enjoy the opportunity to relish in a lifestyle in which they were familiar. Today, Indian River Colony Club is not only for those retired from a military career, but for all those that have served and a limited number of non-military patriots.
Military History of IRCC
Activities
galore!
Golf, tennis, bocce, dance, sing, paint, act… the list is endless, with choices of over 60 groups and activities.
Individually Owned, Single Family Homes,
18 Floor Plans
There are a limited number of lots available for building the Trenton or the Augusta Models. See the
floor plans
and view all of our listings on the
Real Estate
page.
Ideal Location on Florida’s Space Coast:
So much to do! Only minutes from Patrick Space Force Base, VA Clinic, beautiful beaches, upscale shopping, fine dining, the Brevard Zoo, Eastern Florida State College, Melbourne International Airport, and the Maxwell King Center for the Performing Arts. Also a short ride to the Kennedy Space Center, Port Canaveral Cruise Terminal, and only one hour to Orlando’s main attractions.
FLORIDA HAS NO STATE INCOME TAX & NO ESTATE TAX!
Employment
on the Space Coast:
For those of you that would like to continue working, there are many job opportunities on the Space Coast in the area of technology as well as many other interesting fields of employment.
Country Club Amenities:
Indulge in wonderful cuisine in the At Ease Club, a full club staff with an executive chef, golf every day on the private 18-hole, par-72 private golf course, play tennis, bocce, swim in our 3,000 sq ft. pool, or just enjoy a lazy day at the pool.
Fact Sheet
Mission Statement

Follow Us:
Social & Golf Memberships
Ask About Our Military Discount!
Social / Golf  Membership Brochure
Indian River Colony Club is a proud community made up of those who have served in the military or made it a career, and a limited number of non-military patriots.

This community of friendly patriots is now offering you the opportunity to enjoy the many amenities of this golf & country club without buying a home. So whether you’re new to the Space Coast, visiting for the winter, or just looking to make new friends while enjoying a country club lifestyle, a Social Membership at IRCC is for you.
Contact us below
, or call
321-255-6000
and ask for Membership Services to schedule a tour or request more information.
Memberships have access to
over 60 Clubs & Activities
!
Art, Quilting & Craft Groups
Ballroom, Hula & Line Dancing
Bingo
Book Clubs
Bridge, Poker & Mah Jongg
Clown Group
Computer Club
Concerts & Theater
Enrichment Programs with Guest Speakers
Fitness Classes
Golf, Tennis, and Biking Groups
Home of the MOAA Cape Canaveral Chapter
Holiday Marketplaces
Military History Club
Musical Groups
Rifle & Pistol Club
Trivia
Fitness Classes: Water Aerobics, Yoga, and Tai Chi
…
and So Much More
!
Amenities
IRCC is “The Place Patriots Call Home”™, where members enjoy the camaraderie of fellow veterans of the U.S. Military. Our fun, friendly members are the #1 amenity here at Indian River Colony Club.
18 Hole, Par 72 Golf Course designed by Gordon Lewis
Three well-maintained Har-Tru Tennis Courts
Casual & Fine Dining at the At Ease Club
19th Hole Bar & Grill
Resort-Style Pool with Lap Lanes
State-of-the-Art Fitness Center
Bocce, Croquet & Shuffleboard
Non-Denominational Chapel
RV & Boat Storage
18 Hole, Par 72 Golf Course
Play golf on the best manicured golf course in Brevard County. From novice to pro, golf every day on our beautiful Gordon Lewis designed course. Features a pro shop, aqua driving range, two putting greens, and practice bunkers.
If you enjoy the competition, tournaments are scheduled regularly!
Pro Shop
Get the gear you need at our pro shop. Improve your game with golf lessons available from our on-site golf pro.
Member Golf Groups
Join one of our many golfing groups and socialize with like-minded golfers.
Colony Hall
Plays, Military Balls, Banquets, Social Gatherings, and Club Meetings are held at our Colony Hall Facility, featuring a Stage, Dance Floor, and More!
Contact Us to Find Out More!

Analytics
Analytics
Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.

_ga
2 years
The _ga cookie, installed by Google Analytics, calculates visitor, session and campaign data and also keeps track of site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognize unique visitors.

Installed by Google Analytics, _gid cookie stores information on how visitors use a website, while also creating an analytics report of the website's performance. Some of the data that are collected include the number of visitors, their source, and the pages they visit anonymously.
